attributes.action: If we have a no Brexit then we will have a no council tax bill
attributes.background: You as the government should listen to what us as the British people have voted for. So make your mind up No Brexit=No Council tax bill

rejection.details:
You might like to sign on of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/246387

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245615
